
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/mingupupu/p/18764536" title="发布于 2025-03-11 10:43">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Manus的开源复刻OpenManus初探</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="openmanus介绍">OpenManus介绍</h2>
<p>Manus需要邀请码才能体验，目前大部分人都体验不到。</p>
<p>有几个大佬花3个小时就复现了一个简单的原型OpenManus，让我们体验体验吧！！</p>
<p>截至目前，该项目已经获得了25.9k颗星标，是一个非常热门的项目。</p>
<p>GitHub地址：<a href="https://github.com/mannaandpoem/OpenManus" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/mannaandpoem/OpenManus</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329194-750869781.png" alt="image-20250311100212446" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="实践">实践</h2>
<p>话不多说，直接上手实践。</p>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">git clone https://github.com/mannaandpoem/OpenManus.git
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">cd OpenManus
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">uv venv
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">.venv\Scripts\activate
</code></pre>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">uv pip install -r requirements.txt
</code></pre>
<p>上手配置：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329124-1747097844.png" alt="image-20250311100600763" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将config.example.toml复制一份重命名为config.toml。</p>
<p>或者直接运行命令：</p>
<pre><code class="language-cmd">cp config/config.example.toml config/config.toml
</code></pre>
<p>我先使用硅基流动的Qwen/Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct模型试试水。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329131-1709057332.png" alt="image-20250311100938940" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>直接运行main.py即可。</p>
<p>运行之后如下所示：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329139-523836535.png" alt="image-20250311101034092" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>需要你输入一个任务。</p>
<p>我就以“导航至https://github.com/mannaandpoem/OpenManus获取star数量”为例。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329194-799809114.png" alt="image-20250311101318649" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329105-617845993.png" alt="image-20250311101355429" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>确实打开了浏览器，但是报错了没有能够完成这个任务。</p>
<p>可能跟模型的能力有关。</p>
<p>我这次使用gemini-2.0-flash再试试。</p>
<p>配置文件如下所示：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329737-1999112415.png" alt="image-20250311101838068" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>再试试刚刚那个任务：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329806-548624651.png" alt="image-20250311102306312" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>再试试获取这个仓库的前五个问题：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329736-257071311.png" alt="image-20250311102448597" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329790-1461975860.png" alt="image-20250311102516892" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>接下来测试一下生成文件的功能，输入“生成一个test.txt文件，里面写入小铭同学AI工具学习记录”。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329791-1570818214.png" alt="image-20250311102747068" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250311104329836-1752331039.png" alt="image-20250311102806589" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>简单测试了一个OpenManus用Gemini可以跑通了。</p>
<p>还有一个类似的项目叫OWL，目前遇到的一个问题就是一直没有看到浏览器出现。</p>
<p>目前还没有解决，试了Gemini也还是不行。</p>
<p>等等看有没有什么解决方案吧！！</p>
<p>以上就是今天的分享，希望对你有所帮助。</p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
